summary: Adds a merchant with new items for stealthy players and new features for the Dawnstar Sanctuary.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][u]THE MERCHANT IS IN THE NIGHTGATE INN BASEMENT![/u][/i]
[/b]
Its a simple mod that adds a merchant with new items designed for stealthy players, it also adds a new member to the Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary.

Go to your chambers in the sanctuary and read the letter sent to you on your table, it'll explain it all to you.

Features:

New merchant, where you can buy anything an assassin or a thief ever needs, new spelltomes and weapons/armor with new enchantments and potions has been added to him.

The sanctuary now have Dark Guardians, similar to the ones in Oblivion, the 2 members now look a bit more unique than before and have names.

One additional dunmer member named Relen has been added as well as his pet, Scriby which is an ash hopper, as of now Scriby is not recruitable.

Relen's backstory is in the game, go to your bedroom and you'll find it near the bookshelf.

If someone would like to volunteer to make the ash hopper a follower, go ahead, but i have no knowledge of doing that.
author: Overkill55
